entry.title: Awesome Chatgpt Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
entry.content:
Official Resource

  • ChatGPT website
  • ChatGPT launch blog post

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Browser Extensions

  • ChatGPT for Google: Chrome/Edge/Firefox Browser extension. Display ChatGPT response alongside Google Search results. (Firefox Add-on, source code (⭐13k))
  • ChatGPT Extension: Chrome Extension that lets you quickly access OpenAI's ChatGPT on the web. (source code (⭐452))
  • ChatGPT Everywhere (⭐3k): Chrome extension that adds ChatGPT to every text box on the internet. (demo)

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Desktop Applications

  • ChatGPT Desktop App (⭐2k): Windows/MacOS desktop menubar app using tauri & rust.
  • chatgpt-mac (⭐6.4k): MacOS menubar app.

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Editors

  • ChatGPT for VSCode (⭐5k): VSCode extension. (demo)
  • chatgpt.vim (⭐279): Neovim plugin that lets you query ChatGPT inside a Neovim buffer.
  • docGPT (⭐673): ChatGPT directly within Google Docs as an Editor Add-on.

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Launcher Extensions

  • ChatGPT Raycast extension (⭐601): Run ChatGPT through Raycast extension.

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Chatbots

  • Twitter/@ChatGPTBot: Twitter bot. (source code (⭐759))
  • ChatGPT ProBot (⭐384): GitHub APP. Type /chatgpt to chat with ChatGPTBot.
  • chatgpt-telegram (⭐3.9k): Run your own GPTChat Telegram bot, with a single command.
  • ChatGPT Telegram Bot in AWS Lambda (⭐321): ChatGPT Telegram Bot running in AWS Lambda. Supports voice messages & markdown rendering.
  • chatbot-telegram (⭐43): ChatGPT Telegram Bot powered by Deno and TypeScript.
  • chatGPT-discord-bot (⭐2.7k): Integrate your own Discord bot using chatGPT.
  • wechat-chatgpt (⭐13k): Use ChatGPT On Wechat via wechaty.
  • ChatGPT LINE Bot (⭐109) (Chinese content): Build your own ChatGPT LINE bot.
  • gpt-ai-assistant (⭐7.7k) (Chinese content): Run your own GPT LINE bot on Vercel in 10 minutes.

Use ChatGPT Anywhere / Reverse Proxy

  • gpt.chatapi.art: ChatGPT reverse proxy site, intended for people with restricted access to areas by OpenAI.

Extend ChatGPT Feature / Reverse Proxy

  • ShareGPT: Share your wildest ChatGPT conversations with one click. (demo)
  • ChatGPT export to PNG/PDF/HTML (⭐1.5k): Chrome extension for downloading your ChatGPT history to PNG, PDF or a sharable link.
  • ChatGPT Advanced (⭐6.5k): Chrome extension that augments your ChatGPT prompts with web results.
  • TampermonkeyUserscripts/ChatGPTVoiceInput (⭐228) (Chinese content): Tampermonkey script. ChatGPT voice input interface (supports English/Chinese/Japanese/Korean).

Applications / Reverse Proxy

  • summarize.site: Chrome extension to summarize web page content.
  • commitgpt (⭐1.6k): Automatically generate commit messages using ChatGPT.
  • chatgpt-action (⭐562): Github Action to let ChatGPT review PRs for you.

Prompts / Reverse Proxy

  • showGPT: Website with curated list of best prompts, and you can submit your own easily.
  • Awesome ChatGPT Prompts (⭐130k): ChatGPT prompts that works well.
  • awesome-chatgpt (⭐583): Posts & thoughts about prompting ChatGPT for different usages

Development Tools (API, SDK) / Reverse Proxy

  • PyChatGPT (⭐4.2k) (Python): Lightweight, TLS-Based ChatGPT API on your CLI without requiring a browser or access token.
  • pip/revChatGPT (⭐28k) (Python): Lightweight package for interacting with ChatGPT's API by OpenAI. Uses reverse engineered official API.
  • npm/chatgpt (⭐18k) (Node.js): Node.js client for the unofficial ChatGPT API.
  • ChatGPT API Dart (⭐56) (Dart): Dart client for the unofficial ChatGPT API.
  • go-chatgpt (⭐64) (Golang): An unofficial ChatGPT client in Golang.

Experiments / Reverse Proxy

  • gptlang (⭐345): Experiment to see if we can create a programming language in ChatGPT.
entry.summary: 37 awesome projects updated on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
